alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 10:31AM EST until January 05 at 12:30PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville affecting Owsley County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 13.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and crest at a stage of 28.3 feet by early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 5 PM.
